title: Martian Walker
summaries: The Martian Walker is a Hardmode, post-Golem enemy that spawns during the Martian Madness event. It appears as a large tripod enemy that moves at a very fast pace, and has the ability to fire blue Laser Ray at the player, with a maximum fire rate of once every 0.12 seconds (7 ticks) or 8.6 shots per second. These traits combined with its amount of health and its resistance against knockback can make this enemy somewhat difficult to defeat.
